Name: Seated Row Machine Life Fitness (Row/Rear Deltoid)
Notes: Pronated grip, pad at chest height (above sternum) - emphasis on upper back

Name: Wide Grip Pulldown Machine Life Fitness
Notes: Stretch at the top and contract well at the bottom

Name: Low Row Unilateral Machine Hammer (MTS Row)
Notes: Do not relax scapulae, contract at the end. Emphasis on upper back

Name: Diagonal Row Unilateral Machine Hammer (MTS High Row)
Notes: Slightly lean your torso towards the side you are rowing. Do not relax scapula.

Name: Pullover Unilateral Cable
Notes: Torso inclined forward and slight lateral tilt towards the working lat

Name: Facepull with Rope on Cable
Notes: Cable set at head height

Name: Standing Rear Delt Cable Row
Notes: Cable set at shoulder height, static elbow

Name: Incline Press Machine Life Fitness
Notes: Scapular retraction.

Name: Seated Chest Fly
Notes: At the end of the movement, focus on 'bringing the biceps together.'

Name: Lateral Raises Lying on Gironda Row with Wrist Straps
Notes: Raise hands forming a Y instead of a T (do not raise hands to the sides)

Name: Lateral Raises with Dumbbells
Notes: Use light weight, control technique throughout, no explosive start.

Name: Lateral Raises on Bench Chest Supported
Notes: Kneeling on bench with chest supported. Bench set at 75ยบ.

Name: Seated Lateral Raise Machine Life Fitness
Incline Press on Smith Machine
Notes: Do not lower all the way down

Name: Calf Raises
Notes: Stretch both at the top and bottom, no cheating

Name: Adductor Machine (Close)
Notes: Do not open excessively, focus on final contraction

Name: 45ยบ Leg Press
Notes: Do not skimp on range of motion

Name: Incline Hyperextensions - Hamstring Focus
Notes: Set the bench as low as possible, focus on mind-muscle connection.

Name: Romanian Deadlift with Dumbbells
Notes: Dumbbells close to the body, slight knee bend.

Name: Stiff-Legged Deadlift with Barbell
Notes: Minimal knee bend.

Name: Bulgarian Split Squat on Smith Machine - Quad Focus
Notes: Support foot on the ground at bar height, do not move the foot too far forward.

Name: Bulgarian Split Squat on Smith Machine - Glute Focus
Notes: Support foot forward past the bar. Torso leans forward as you descend.

Name: Leg Extension Machine Life Fitness Bilateral
French Press with Dumbbells
Notes: Avoid flaring elbows

Name: High Pulley Triceps Extension with Wrist Strap
Notes: Keep pulley close to shoulder joint trajectory

Name: Triceps Pushdown with V Bar
Notes: Elbows close to body

Name: Unilateral Katana Extension
Notes: Reach full extension during eccentric phase

Name: Triceps Extension on Cable (Single Arm with Rope)
Unilateral Dumbbell Curl
Notes: Slight torso inclination when curling.

Name: Bilateral Dumbbell Curl
Notes: Both arms at the same time. Don't forget supination.

Name: Bayesian Curl on Cable
Notes: Shoulder joint completely static, only biceps work

Name: Curl on Scott Bench Machine
Notes: Squeeze fully at the top of the concentric phase

Name: Kaz Press on Smith Machine
Notes: Bar at face height, elbows slightly tucked in
